title: Implication of gender inequality in Mexico

content.question: Which of the following is an implication of gender inequality in Mexico?

choices.label: Gender inequality is almost nonexistent because of social reforms implemented by the PRI.
Although gender inequality still exists, gender quotas in the party list system have helped to increase female representation.
Gender inequality is only a concern in northern Mexico where the maquiladoras are located.
Gender inequality is growing because of the focus on economic reforms at the cost of most social issues.

content.answer: Although gender inequality still exists, gender quotas in the party list system have helped to increase female representation.
